footer.all-content-availabe-under: All content is available under the

unauthorised.not-authorised: You are not authorised to use this service
unauthorised.not-registered: It looks like you are not registered for this service.
unauthorised.contact-us: If you think this is a mistake and you need to speak to someone, please contact us using the options below.

contact-us.speak-to-admin: To speak to a hearings administrator:

contact-us-folding.call-vh-team: Call the video hearings team on

equipment-problem.not-working-call-us: something's not working, please call us now.

error.problem-with-service: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
error.need-to-speak: If you need to speak to someone please contact us using the options below.
error.problem-with-connection: There's a problem with your connection
error.default-body-message: Please reconnect. Call us if you keep seeing this message.
error.you-not-connected: You are not connected to the internet. You will not be able to join your video hearing until you are reconnected. Please call the Video Hearings Team to let them know you cannot connect to our service.
error.check-security-settings: Please check that your security settings are not blocking the connection.
error.keep-seeing-message: If you keep seeing this message contact the video hearings team.
error.find-out-more: Find out more about your computer set-up and internet connection at:
error.computer-part-of-network: If your computer is part of a network, your IT support will find guidance and firewall settings at:
error.call-vh-team: Call the Video Hearings team on
error.click-reconnect: Please click "Reconnect" to return to the previous page. Call us if you keep seeing this message.

error-service.click-reconnect: Please click "Reconnect" to return to the previous page. Call us if you keep seeing this message.
error-service.problem-with-connection: There's a problem with your connection
error-service.camera-mic-blocked: Your camera and microphone are blocked
error-service.please-unblock: Please unblock the camera and microphone or call us if there is a problem.

error-camera-microphone.problem-with-camera-mic: There is a problem with your camera and microphone
error-camera-microphone.camera-mic-in-use: Your camera and microphone may already be in use. Please close any application that may be using your camera and microphone and try again.
error-camera-microphone.camera-mic-cannot-be-found: Your camera and microphone cannot be found. Please connect your camera and microphone and try again.
error-camera-microphone.call-us: Call us if you're still seeing this message.

not-found.typed-web-address: If you typed the web address, check it is correct.
not-found.pasted-web-address: If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.
not-found.web-address-correct: If the web address is correct or you selected a link or button, contact us using the options below.

select-media-devices.browser-support: Your browser does not support video
select-media-devices.green-bar: Make sure the green bar moves when you speak
select-media-devices.permission-switch-off-camera: You need permission from the court to switch off your camera

self-test.browser-not-support: Your browser does not support video

unsupported-browser.using-unsupported-browser: You've signed in using an unsupported browser
unsupported-browser.it-looks-like: It looks like you've signed in using
unsupported-browser.unfortunately-this-browser: Unfortunately this browser is not currently supported.
unsupported-browser.please-sign-out: Please sign out and sign in again using any of the following.

unsupported-device.service-will-not-work: The service will not work on the device you’re using. Please sign out and sign in again.
unsupported-device.laptop-or-desktop: a laptop or desktop computer with a camera and microphone
unsupported-device.if-you-cannot-access: If you cannot access a suitable device, call the video hearings team on 0300 303 0655.

camera-check.could-you-see-yourself-on-the-screen: Could you see yourself on the screen in the camera window?

declaration.please-tick-the-box-to-confirm-no-record: Please tick the box to confirm that you will not record the hearing in any way
declaration.it-is-a-criminal-offence: It is a criminal offence to record this hearing (by audio or video), to publish any such recording, or to take any images (by photo or screenshot)
declaration.i-confirm-that-i-will-not-record-or-take: I confirm that I will not record or take any images of this hearing

equipment-check.lets-confirm-your-equipment-is-working: Let's confirm your equipment is working
equipment-check.this-short-video: This short video will help you check that your camera and microphone are working.

hearing-rules.you-must-follow-courtroom-rules: You must follow the same rules as you would in a courtroom.
hearing-rules.must-only-use-your-phone-to-contact-the-: must only use your phone for contact with the video hearings team
hearing-rules.are-not-allowed-to-smoke-including-e-cig: are not allowed to smoke (including e-cigarettes)
hearing-rules.must-be-alone-unless-you-have-the-judges: must be alone unless you have the judge’s permission to have someone with you
hearing-rules.must-ask-the-judges-permission-to-move-a: must ask the judge's permission if you need to move away from your screen

independent-self-test.please-call-beforenumber: Please call the video hearings team on

introduction.check-that-your-equipment-is-working: check that your equipment is working
introduction.tell-you-about-the-rules-of-the-court: tell you about the rules of the court

judge-hearing-list.if-no-details-shown-please-contact-us: If you are expecting to see details of your hearing listed here, please contact us using the options below.
judge-hearing-list.call-the-video-hearings-team-on: Call the video hearings team on

judge-hearing-table.judicial-consultation-room-is-now-closed: Judicial consultation room is now closed

judge-self-test.please-call-beforenumber: Please call the video hearings team on
judge-self-test.we-will-tell-the-participants-their-hear: We'll tell the participants their hearing may be delayed.

microphone-check.select-if-you-could-see-the-bar-moving-w: Select if you could see the bar moving when you spoke
microphone-check.could-you-see-the-bar-moving-when-you-sp: Could you see the bar moving when you spoke?

participant-hearings.you-do-not-have-a-video-hearing-today: You do not have a video hearing today
participant-hearings.if-no-details-shown-please-contact-us: If you were expecting to see the details of a hearing here, please contact the video hearings team.

participant-self-test.when-the-video-has-ended-answer-3-questi: When the video has ended, answer 3 questions to confirm your microphone and camera are working.

switch-on-camera-microphone.switch-on-camera-and-mic-to-watch-the-vi: Switch on your camera and microphone to watch the video.
switch-on-camera-microphone.your-camera-and-microphone-are-switched-: Your camera and microphone are switched on
switch-on-camera-microphone.camera-and-mic-are-switched-on-you-can-c: Your camera and microphone are switched on. You can now continue to the video.
switch-on-camera-microphone.your-camera-and-microphone-are-blocked: Your camera and microphone are blocked
switch-on-camera-microphone.sorry-you-must-use-camera-and-mic: We're sorry, you can't take part in the hearing without using your camera and microphone.
switch-on-camera-microphone.stay-close-to-your-phone-we-will-call-in: Stay close to your phone and we'll call you within 5 minutes.
switch-on-camera-microphone.sorry-hearing-can-not-go-ahead-if-camera: We're sorry, the hearing can't go ahead if your camera and microphone are blocked.
switch-on-camera-microphone.please-unblock-camera-and-mic-or-call-us: Please unblock the camera and microphone or call us if there is a problem.

video-check.could-you-see-and-hear-the-video-clearly: Could you see and hear the video clearly?
video-check.select-if-the-image-and-sound-were-clear: Select if the image and sound were clear
video-check.were-the-image-and-sound-clear: Were the image and sound clear?

consultation-error.message: Sorry, there was an error with your private consultation

consultation-leave.message: You are about to leave the meeting
consultation-leave.return-wr-message: You'll be returning to the waiting room.

joh-waiting-room.hearing-starting-at: Your video hearing is scheduled to begin at
joh-waiting-room.hearing-closed: This hearing has finished. You may now sign out.
joh-waiting-room.hearing-paused: The judge will restart the hearing when they are ready. Please stay near your screen.
joh-waiting-room.hearing-suspended--message: All participants are affected. Stay near your screen for further updates. There's no need to call us.
joh-waiting-room.browser-doesnt-support-video: Your browser does not support Video

judge-waiting-room.browser-support-message: Your browser does not support Video

hearing-messages.not-started: If any participants are not connected, you must call the video hearings team on {{phone}} before you start the hearing.
hearing-messages.paused: Please call the video hearings team on {{phone}} if you're having problems. We'll update the participants.
hearing-messages.suspended: The video hearings team has been alerted and we're informing the participants. Please call us now on {{phone}}.
hearing-messages.closed: The consultation room is available for up to 30 minutes after the hearing has finished.
hearing-messages.consultation-room-will-close-at: The consultation room will close at

judge-waiting-room.please-wait-while-we-connect-you: Please wait while we connect you...

hearing-is-being-recorded.true: The audio of this hearing is being recorded.
hearing-is-being-recorded.false: The audio of this hearing is NOT being recorded.

participant-chat.open: Open instant messaging chat window arrow
participant-chat.close: Close instant messaging chat window arrow

participant-network-health.show-detail: The hearing may be disrupted if your internet connection does not improve
participant-network-health.tips-for-improving-your-internet-connect: Tips for improving your internet connection
participant-network-health.message1: If you're on WiFi, try moving close to your router
participant-network-health.message2: If others are using the same connection, ask if they can wait until you've finished your hearing
participant-network-health.message3: If possible, use a wired connection rather than WiFi

waiting-room-monitor.trouble-seeing: Others may have trouble seeing and hearing you.

participant-waiting-room.browser-support: Your browser does not support video
participant-waiting-room.lock-the-room: Lock the room to prevent others joining
participant-waiting-room.invite-others: Invite others by calling them or unlock the room for others to join

Please get ready
You'll   join the hearing in a few seconds
participant-waiting-room.hearing-starting-at: Your video hearing is scheduled to begin at

hearing-status-messages.starting-body: Make sure you're ready when the judge starts the hearing.
hearing-status-messages.delayed-body: We're sorry for the delay. Stay near your screen for further updates.
hearing-status-messages.closed: This hearing has finished. You may now sign out.
hearing-status-messages.paused: The judge will restart the hearing when they are ready. Please stay near your screen.
hearing-status-messages.suspended-body: All participants are affected. Stay near your screen for further updates. There's no need to call us.
hearing-status-messages.in-session-body: The judge will bring you into the hearing when they are ready for you. An alert will sound and you will join the hearing a few seconds later.

participant-waiting-room.hearing-about-to-start: The judge will bring you into the hearing when they are ready for you. An alert will sound and you will join the hearing a few seconds later.

private-consultation.talk-to-other-participants: You can talk to other participants in private before the hearing begins or during a break, if you wish.
private-consultation.guide1: Start a meeting by choosing who you want to speak to from the list
private-consultation.guide2: Join a meeting that's already started by choosing from the list
private-consultation.guide3: If a meeting room is locked you'll need to be invited by someone in the meeting
private-consultation.guide4: If you wish to have a private conversation during the hearing you'll need to ask the judge's permission.

invite-participant.invite-this-person: Invite this person to the meeting

join-private-consultation.confidential-declaration: All meetings outside the hearing are confidential and not recorded as part of court or tribunal proceedings

start-private-consultation.invite: Invite others to a private meeting
start-private-consultation.confidential-declaration: All meetings outside the hearing are confidential and not recorded as part of court or tribunal proceedings

participants-panel.mute-tooltip: Mute all participants and prevent them from unmuting
